mapper.sql:
FROM oyMember a LEFT JOIN oymbPhone f on f.oympDefaultNy=1 AND f.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq LEFT JOIN oymbEmail g on g.oymeDefaultNy=1 AND g.oymbSeq = a.oymbSeq
WHERE 1=1
AND a.oymbDelNy = 1 AND a.oymbDelNy = 0
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{scDateStart} AND #{scDateEnd}
AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{scDateStart} AND #{scDateEnd}
AND a.oymbDob BETWEEN #{scDateStart} AND #{scDateEnd}
AND a.oymbSeq = #{scValue} AND a.oymbGradeCd LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
AND a.oymbName LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND a.oymbNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
AND a.oymbId LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND a.oymbGenderCd LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
AND f.oympNumber LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
AND g.oymeEmailFull LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.oymbSeq , a.oymbName , a.oymbNameEng , a.oymbId , a.oymbGenderCd , a.oymbGradeCd , a.oymbDelNy , a.oymbDob , a.regDateTime , a.modDateTime , f.oympNumber , g.oymeEmailFull
ORDER BY oymbSeq DESC limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
